organizations: Biamba Marie Mutombo Hospital and Research Center
lead_paragraph: Dikembe Mutombo, the Houston Rockets’ center, yesterday postponed plans to open a hospital in Congo because of post-election fighting. Mutombo expected to open the $29 million Biamba Marie Mutombo Hospital and Research Center, named for his mother and built in large measure from his $15 million donation, on Sept. 2. The 300-bed hospital will provide health care to people in Kinshasa, where Mutombo was born.
